explanation: [0-0] A female character wearing a silver sequined outfit, silver boots, and a silver high ponytail stands in a neon-lit nightscape, looking to the right, holding half a red heart in each hand.

[0-2] She then looks up, opens her arms to the sides, and raises them again. The two halves of the heart come together to form a glowing white heart. She raises her hands in front of her, looks up at it, and her outfit turns into a blue sequined one.

[0-2] She then looks up, opens her arms to the sides, and raises them again. The two halves of the heart come together to form a glowing white heart. She raises her hands in front of her, looks up at it, and her outfit turns into a blue sequined one.

[2-4] The scene then switches to a character wearing a red mask and a blue bodysuit, arms outstretched to the sides, holding half a red heart in each hand, looking upwards. He then raises his arms, and the two halves of the heart come together to form a glowing white heart. The character in the blue bodysuit turns light blue and smiles as he watches the white heart, lowering his arms.
